lead_paragraph: A caption last Sunday for a picture in some editions, with an article about the history of Jamaica’s world-class track program, carried an erroneous credit. The photograph of Dr. Herb Elliott, the public health officer in charge of athletic drug testing during competitions on the island, was taken by Ross Sheil — not by Peter Dean Rickards, who also supplied pictures for the article.
